name: fmihel-polyfills
description: include some polyfills in my offline browsers projects

scripts.git-push: git push polyfills && git push polyfills --tag
scripts.npm-publish-patch: npm version patch && npm publish && npm run git-push
scripts.npm-publish-minor: npm version minor && npm publish && npm run git-push
scripts.npm-publish-major: npm version major && npm publish && npm run git-push

author: fmihel76@gmail.com
